title: (x) London Fashion Week heavy blocky sans caps - (similar to) OL Smokler Bold {Akira}
content:
Any idea what this is please? I’m sure I’ve seen it on something else so am quite confident it’s digital.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181112im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_6280.jpg)

 [‹ (x) SuperBrugsen corporate sans - custom face by Jonas Hecksher (e-Types AS) {Asparouh Kalyandjiev}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181112/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38270 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Pocatello Cycle logo serif face - Accolade {Steven Wulf} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181112/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38791 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jameslangdon

comments.content:
You’re welcome.

[Champion Gothic Heavyweight](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007181112/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100002) will also work well.
